item.description:
If you love exploring the world with your camera, join Bill Truslow in his discussion of capturing the stunning natural landscapes all around the Seacoast.  Bill is an award winning photographer who has been shooting for 25 years for commercial clients, stock, and personal projects (www.truslowphoto.com).  He runs photography workshops near Portsmouth (www.959photoworkshops.com) and will discuss planning, composing and post-processing elements to create a fine art image.  After his talk, if you are interested in more information, Bill has a Seacoast workshop scheduled October 12th-14th.

FYI:  Main Street Art is located at 75 Main Street, Newfields, NH.  If you are interested in purchasing a brown bag lunch from the Newfields Country Store (just down the street from MSA), call 603-773-5656 by 11:15 a.m. and your lunch will be ready for pick-up on your way to the Art Talk.
item.name: Art Talk at Main Street Art in Newfields: Seacoast Travel Photography
